SELECT_MESSAGE = SELECT MESSAGEID, MESSAGEBLOB FROM JMS_MESSAGES WHERE MESSAGEID=? AND DESTINATION=? MARK_MESSAGE = UPDATE JMS_MESSAGES SET TXID=?, TXOP=? WHERE MESSAGEID=? AND DESTINATION=? UPDATE_MARKED_MESSAGES = UPDATE JMS_MESSAGES SET TXID=?, TXOP=? WHERE TXOP=? UPDATE_MARKED_MESSAGES_WITH_TX = UPDATE JMS_MESSAGES SET TXID=?, TXOP=? WHERE TXOP=? AND TXID=? DELETE_TX = DELETE FROM JMS_TRANSACTIONS WHERE TXID = ? DELETE_MARKED_MESSAGES = DELETE FROM JMS_MESSAGES WHERE TXID=? AND TXOP=? DELETE_MESSAGE = DELETE FROM JMS_MESSAGES WHERE MESSAGEID=? AND DESTINATION=? CREATE_MESSAGE_TABLE = CREATE TABLE JMS_MESSAGES (MESSAGEID INTEGER NOT NULL, DESTINATION VARCHAR(150) NOT NULL, TXID INTEGER, TXOP CHAR(1), MESSAGEBLOB BLOB, PRIMARY KEY (MESSAGEID, DESTINATION)) CREATE_TX_TABLE = CREATE TABLE JMS_TRANSACTIONS (TXID INTEGER) CREATE_TABLES_ON_STARTUP = TRUE
